food.name: BBQ Pulled Pork Sliders
food.description: Tender pulled pork slow-cooked in BBQ sauce, served on soft slider buns with pickles.

food.name: Falafel
food.description: Deep-fried chickpea balls seasoned with herbs and spices. Served in pita with fresh vegetables and tahini.

food.name: Grilled Shrimp Skewers
food.description: Marinated shrimp grilled with a zesty garlic-lemon herb sauce.

food.name: Shawarma
food.description: Shawarma is a delicious, flavorful meat dish made by slow-cooking marinated lamb, chicken, or beef on a vertical rotisserie. It’s typically served in a warm flatbread with garlic sauce, pickles, and vegetables.

food.name: Cheese Fondue
food.description: A melting pot of Gruyère and Emmental cheese served with bread, vegetables, and fruits.

food.name: Mac and Cheese
food.description: A creamy, cheesy pasta dish made with elbow macaroni and a blend of melted cheeses.

food.name: Mozzarella Sticks
food.description: Golden, crispy breaded mozzarella sticks served with marinara sauce.

food.name: Cheeseburger
food.description: Juicy beef patty topped with cheddar cheese, lettuce, tomato, pickles, and special sauce.

food.name: Lobster Roll
food.description: Fresh lobster meat mixed with a light mayo dressing, served in a buttery toasted bun.

food.name: Chicken Parmesan
food.description: Breaded chicken cutlet topped with marinara sauce and melted mozzarella, served over spaghetti.

food.name: Chocolate Lava Cake
food.description: Decadent chocolate cake with a molten center, served with vanilla ice cream.

food.name: Tiramisu
food.description: Classic Italian dessert made with layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers, mascarpone cheese, and cocoa.

food.name: Cheesecake
food.description: Smooth, creamy cheesecake with a buttery graham cracker crust, topped with strawberry sauce.

food.name: Lemon Meringue Pie
food.description: Tangy lemon filling topped with a light, fluffy meringue, in a buttery pie crust.

food.name: Iced Matcha Latte
food.description: A chilled blend of matcha green tea and creamy milk, served over ice.

food.name: Strawberry Lemonade
food.description: Refreshing lemonade mixed with fresh strawberry puree and a hint of mint.

food.name: Virgin Mojito
food.description: A refreshing mix of mint, lime, sugar, and soda water.

food.name: Cucumber Mint Cooler
food.description: A crisp and cool mix of cucumber, mint, and soda water, perfect for a hot day.

food.name: Peach Iced Tea
food.description: Sweetened iced tea with a splash of fresh peach puree.

food.name: Carrot Cake
food.description: Moist carrot cake with cream cheese frosting and a sprinkle of walnuts.

food.name: Seafood Boil
food.description: A delicious seafood boil with shrimp, crab, lobster, corn, potatoes, and seasoned with Old Bay spices, served with melted butter.

food.name: Chicken Alfredo
food.description: Creamy Alfredo sauce with grilled chicken and fettuccine, topped with parmesan.

food.name: Four Cheese Pizza
food.description: A delicious mix of mozzarella, cheddar, parmesan, and gouda on a crispy crust.

food.name: Cheesy Meatball Sub
food.description: Savory meatballs in marinara sauce, topped with melted mozzarella, served in a toasted sub roll.

food.name: Beef Wellington
food.description: Tender beef wrapped in puff pastry with mushroom duxelles and a creamy cheese sauce.

food.name: BBQ Ribs
food.description: Tender pork ribs glazed with a smoky barbecue sauce, topped with melted cheddar cheese.

food.name: Samosa
food.description: Crispy pastry filled with spiced potatoes and peas, served with chutney.

food.name: Ice Cream with Marshmallows
food.description: Creamy vanilla ice cream topped with sweet, fluffy marshmallows.

food.name: Red Velvet Cake
food.description: Rich, moist red velvet cake with a smooth cream cheese frosting.

food.name: Chips Masala
food.description: Crispy fries tossed in a spicy, tangy masala seasoning.
